titles.title: Choosing a Crypto Platform in the UK: Fees, Safety and FCA Registration Explained
titles.rationale: Fits MoneyMagpie’s practical, consumer-first tone by demystifying platform selection. Naturally links to the external resource when advising readers to compare UK platforms; the body copy can use the anchor phrase in context to direct readers to a vetted overview.

titles.title: The Hidden Costs of Buying Crypto in the UK (and How to Avoid Them)
titles.rationale: Money-saving angle aligns with MoneyMagpie. A section on comparing platform fees, spreads and withdrawal charges can point readers to an up-to-date UK platform comparison, using the anchor text naturally within the copy.

titles.title: A Beginner’s UK Checklist Before You Buy Your First Crypto
titles.rationale: Checklist format matches site style and encourages actionable steps. One item is to choose an FCA-registered platform; that step can link to the UK-focused comparison guide using the anchor phrase in-line.

titles.title: Pound‑cost Averaging With Crypto: Start Small from £10 a Week
titles.rationale: Budget-friendly, low-risk framing suits MoneyMagpie readers. When explaining how to set up recurring buys, the article can direct readers to compare UK platforms that offer this feature, using the anchor text naturally in the supporting paragraph.

titles.title: UK Crypto Tax Basics for 2025: Records, Allowances and Common Pitfalls
titles.rationale: Tax guidance is a staple for MoneyMagpie. A section on clean record-keeping and compliant platforms can reference a UK exchange comparison as a practical next step, weaving the anchor term into the explanatory copy without using it in the title.

Guidance:
1. Combine your own knowledge of moneymagpie.com's catalog with the SERP references to surface authentic angles.
2. Make every title feel native to moneymagpie.com while naturally justifying a link to https://sterling-savvy.co.uk/en/cryptocurrency/best-crypto-exchange-uk/.
3. Use the anchor text only when it reads naturally inside supporting copy, never inside the title.
4. Titles must exclude best crypto exchange uk and any casino/operator brand names entirely; reserve brand mentions for rationales.
5. If extra notes or your knowledge indicate a placement locale, tailor the titles accordingly; otherwise keep them globally applicable while acknowledging Unspecified where useful.
6. Incorporate any extra campaign notes: .
7. Keep every title free of review or promo phrasing (e.g., avoid 'review', 'bonus', 'promo code').

Examples:
- Bad: "Casiny online casino review" (violates brand + review rule).
- Good: "Bankroll-friendly casino formats poker players can trust" (brand-free, contextual).

Return JSON exactly as {"titles": [{"title": "...", "rationale": "..."}]} with 5 items.
